GEN.[No Retrieval]: a tag indicating no need for retrieval
GEN.[Retrieval]: a tag indicating need for retrieval
GEN.[Continue to Use Evidence]: a tag indicating continue to use evidence
GEN.[Irrelevant]: a tag to denote content irrelevant to the query
GEN.[Relevant]: a tag to denote content relevant to the query
GEN.[Utility:1]: a tag to denote the current generated result is poor
GEN.[Utility:2]: a tag to denote the current generated result is fair
GEN.[Utility:3]: a tag to denote the current generated result is good
GEN.[Utility:4]: a tag to denote the current generated result is great
GEN.[Utility:5]: a tag to denote the current generated result is excellent
GEN.[Fully supported]: a tag to indicate that the current generated results are all supported by the retrieved documents
GEN.[Partially supported]: a tag to indicate that the current generated result has received partial support from the retrieved documents
GEN.[No support / Contradictory]: a tag to indicate that the current generated result has not received support from the retrieved documents

CTX.<paragraph>: a tag to indicate the start of the retrieved document begins here
CTX.</paragraph>: a tag to indicate the end of the retrieved document starts here
